body:
Heeeeeeeeeey and good Morning/Noon/Evening depending on where on the globe you are located :)

So, In this Post, I am Suggesting a Youtuber/Let´s play rank that Allows any youtuber that wants to upload Avicus Videos, Can do so, And with some facilities that this rank would allow.

-The rank, In my opinion, If this gets implemented, Should have:

-A /nick Command. Now, This command can´t be abused or:
- You can´t impersonate other players(i.e /nick JeromeASF, Or /nick BajanCanadian)
- Your nick can´t contain any offensive, Racist or anything offensive to others. That means, that NaziNigga69 Is not an Allowed nick


Obviously, If this gets implemented, there are some requirements you´ll have to obey:

- The video has to have at least a quality of 480p and be at least of 5 minutes.
- You will have to upload at least 2 videos every week, and At least, One of them with voice.


Obviously, Staff members have to take care about other things to help the server, So that´s why a Physical rank should not get implemented. If this is accepted, Only a /nick command will be implemented to the players that will have this ``rank´´


I have to mention that the Let´s Players should not be part of any of the Staff appointments, just the Normal players ones, So What I mean by this, Is that Let´s Players should not be treated as Staff´s, Just as Normal players.
body_tagged:
Heeeeeeeeeey and good Morning/Noon/Evening depending on where on the globe you are located :)

So, In this Post, I am Suggesting a Youtuber/Let´s play rank that Allows any youtuber that wants to upload Avicus Videos, Can do so, And with some facilities that this rank would allow.

-The rank, In my opinion, If this gets implemented, Should have:

-A /nick Command. Now, This command can´t be abused or:
- You can´t impersonate other players(i.e /nick JeromeASF, Or /nick BajanCanadian)
- Your nick can´t contain any offensive, Racist or anything offensive to others. That means, that NaziNigga69 Is not an Allowed nick


Obviously, If this gets implemented, there are some requirements you´ll have to obey:

- The video has to have at least a quality of 480p and be at least of 5 minutes.
- You will have to upload at least 2 videos every week, and At least, One of them with voice.


Obviously, Staff members have to take care about other things to help the server, So that´s why a Physical rank should not get implemented. If this is accepted, Only a /nick command will be implemented to the players that will have this ``rank´´


I have to mention that the Let´s Players should not be part of any of the Staff appointments, just the Normal players ones, So What I mean by this, Is that Let´s Players should not be treated as Staff´s, Just as Normal players.
title: Youtuber/Let´s Play Rank!

replies.body:
https://avicus.net/forums/1a60f1fea

VIP: Around 5,000 subscribers- this is the one that people should aim for. VIPs receive emerald donor rank things- 2.0 xp multiplier. An example is Peckett- he will be making videos soon. 
Youtubers: Around 50,000 subscribers. This is for major youtubers that join the server and make videos for us. These people receive all of the kits possible. An example is Woofless.

replies.body:
Why would "let's players" have to have /nick? Players won't pay attention To them unless your a popular youtuber with like 50k +

Also updated my first post
